post:
Looking for individuals who can devote some time every week for online promotion activity for a hosting company.

The company is pretty old (3+ years) and fared very well until some time ago.

It used to get good traffic for some low competition KWs.

The job does not require a lot of effort, but it needs small effort every day or every week to improve the situation.

Profit share will be given to person when it gets considerable traffic for those KWs.

Send me the PM and we can take it from there.

Thanks in advance.
